items.sentence: After her husband's death, she brought up the four children by herself.
Nothing is the matter with the car. It's just that you're a bad driver.
The only thing that really matters is whether or not you did your best.
Do you know someone with a truck who could help me move some furniture?
If you'd left a little earlier, you would've avoided the heavy traffic.
There's no way Tom can save up enough money in one year to buy a house.
Now that you're retired, you'll have more time to spend in your garden.
Many new buildings have been built around here in the last three years.
I found out that the woman I thought was a nurse was actually a doctor.
Under normal circumstances, Tom would never agree to do that with Mary.
